column2: "Na afei hɔn a wɔyɛ mbofra sen me sereserew me
column3: Hɔn a hɔn egyanom mpo mopoow dɛ medze hɔn bɛhyɛ mo nguankuw do nkraman mu no a."

column2: "Nyew
column3: hɔn nsamu tum no
column4: ebɛn mfaso na ɔbɛyɛ me? Nyimpa a hɔn mu ahoɔdzen asa."

column2: "Hia na kɔm ntsi wɔafomfɔn; Wɔwewe asaase kɛsɛɛ do wɔ ɔsɛɛ na amamfo kusuww mu."
"Wɔtsetsew nkyenhaban wɔ ndua do: Na sar do mfuwamfuwa ndwow nye hɔn edziban."
"Woetu hɔn efi nyimpa mu; Wɔpɔw dzi hɔn ekyir dɛ wodzi wifo ekyir."
"Bɔnsa mu a hɔ yɛ hu na wɔtsetsee
column3: Wɔ asaase na abotan etu mu."

column2: "Ndua ntamu na wosu dɛ asoaso
column3: Nsason ase na wɔsam."

column2: "Wɔyɛ dɛ egyangyantwimba
column3: nyew
column4: nyimpa a wonnyi dzin mba a; Wɔpaam hɔn fii asaase no do."

column2: "Na afei mabɛyɛ hɔn ndwom
column3: Nyew

column2: "Mo ho yɛ hɔn nkɔw
column3: wɔbɔ me kyɛ kegyina nkyɛn
column4: Na wɔnntwentweɔn ho koraa dɛ wobehima m'enyi do ntafi mpo."

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ Nyankopɔn asan m'ahoma na oehiahia mo ho ntsi
column3: Hɔn so wɔatow ahohyɛdo akyen wɔ m'enyim."

column2: "M'enyimfa do na nkusiwa no soɛr Wosun m'anan fa nkyɛn
column3: Na woyi hɔn sɛɛ akwan ba mo do."

column2: "Wɔsɛɛ mo kwan
column3: Wɔyɛ ma mo mbusu da edzi

column2: "Wɔba dɛ wɔnam tokur a ɔtrɛ mu: Wopirew hɔnho ba mo do wɔ efitu no mu."
"Hu adan aba mo do
column3: Wɔpam m'enyidzii dɛ mframa; Na me yieyɛ etwa mu kɔ dɛ mununkum."

column2: "Na afei me kra anan wɔ mo mu; Ahohiahia nda esusuo mo mu."
"Anadwe hodwow me mbiew mu wɔ mo mu
column3: Na yaw no a ɔwewe me no nngyaa."

column2: "Me yarba ne dzendzen ntsi m'atar asakyer: Ɔkyekyer mo ho dɛ sortar no kɔn."
"Ɔatotow me akyen adɛtsebir mu
column3: Na madan dɛ dɛtse na nso."

column2: "Musu mefrɛ wo
column3: na ɔwo nngye me do: Migyina hɔ

column2: "Ɔwo adan ayɛ etsiɔdzen wɔ mo do; Ɔwo edze wo nsa a ɔyɛ dzen nye me dzi esi."
"Ɔwo na ama me do ama mframa
column3: Ɔwo na ema metsena do tutu kɔ; Na ɔwo na enan me wɔ ehum mu."

column2: "Na minyim dɛ ɔwo edze me bɛma owu
column3: Na fi a wɔahyɛ ama atseasefo nyinara mu."

column2: "Ampaara ɔrenntsen ne nsa nnka efitu ahyɛmukuw; Kaansa ɔyɛ ne sɛɛ mpo a
column3: osian iyinom ntsi obi bosu afrɛ."

column2: "Ana mennsu amma nyia ɔwɔ fona mu? Ana me kra no werɛ annhow wɔ hianyi ntsi?"
"Naaso ber a m'enyi da papa kwan no
column3: nna bɔn aba; Na aber a morotweɔn kan no

column2: "M'ayamudze hur
column3: na ɔnnhom; Ahohiahia nda aba mo do."

column2: "Mebir tumm nenam
column3: naaso ommfi ewia: Migyina bagua no mu

column2: "Mayɛ nua ama mpataku
column3: Na nyɛnko ama nsohor."

column2: "Mo wer ebir
column3: na orifi mo ho

column2: "Dɛm ntsi me nsankutsen adan nkɔmbɔdzi
column3: Na m'atɛntɛbɛn adan hɔn a wosu ndze."
